scripts.buildsrc: npm run buildver && cat src/version.js src/image.js src/sound.js src/param.js src/touch.js > ./pico.js
scripts.buildapp: if [ -n "${npm_config_name}" ]; then mkdir -p ../${npm_config_name} && cp pico.* ../${npm_config_name} && cp index.* ../${npm_config_name} && cp app/${npm_config_name}.js ../${npm_config_name}/app.js && cp app/${npm_config_name}.json ../${npm_config_name}/app.json; fi
scripts.build: npm run buildsrc && npm run buildapp --name=${npm_config_name}
scripts.cleanapp: if [ -n "${npm_config_name}" ]; then rm ../${npm_config_name}/pico.* && rm ../${npm_config_name}/index.* && rm ../${npm_config_name}/app.js && rm ../${npm_config_name}/app.json && rmdir ../${npm_config_name}; fi
